about_the_game:
This bundle allows you to set finely selected BGM from the Mana series to be played during your adventure.

Mana Series BGM Bundle Content:


■FINAL FANTASY ADVENTURE
　Endless Battlefield
　Battle 1
　In Search of the Sword of Mana
　Battle 2

■Secret of Mana
　Into the Thick of It
　Leave Time for Love
　The Oracle
　Meridian Dance

■Trials of Mana
　Swivel
　Powell
　Nuclear Fusion
　Hightension Wire

■Legend of Mana
　Pain of the Universe
　Picturesque Landscape
　The Darkness Nova
　Bejeweled City in Ruins

■Children of Mana
　Wavering Tower of Prayer
　The Sublime Lord of Lightning

■Dawn of Mana
　Dark Shrine
　Burning Spirits
　Reminiscence
　Dance of the Fools

■Heroes of Mana
　As the Heart Wills
　Such Cruel Fate

■Rise of Mana
　The Drip Drip Drip of Memory
　The Enemy Appears

*After downloading this product, they will become available in Main Menu > Settings > Audio > Change BGM > Customize.
*There is also a bundle product that contains this product. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*To use this product, it must be updated to the latest version.
